attributes.action: support criminal investigations into fraudulent expense claims by MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Of the ongoing debate into dubious expense claims by MPs, groups have called for the resignation of certain individuals. The Speaker of the House of Commons should not be made a scapegoat in order to brush the issue under the carpet. Cases of all MPs making fraudulent claims should be refered to the police.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
